show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews Cheryl Meyers. <!--more--> A Purdue University graduate, Cheryl Myers is head of scientific affairs and education for the natural medicine company, EuroPharma, and is an advocate of bridging the worlds of mainstream and natural medicine to achieve optimum health outcomes.
Cheryl has been interviewed by the New York Times, Prevention Magazine, theWall Street Journal and other periodicals on wide ranging topics such as dementia prevention, menopause symptom relief, cancer care, heart disease and many other aspects of health and wellness.
She has appeared on the PBS television show “American Medical Review,” hosted by Morley Safer, to explain coenzyme Q10 and cardiac recovery.
She has acted as a technical consultant for many segments of the PBS TV series “Healing Quest,” hosted by Olivia Newton-John.
On today’s show Cheryl will focus on current research into the herb turmeric and the active constituent curcumin, which is being studied widely for its positive effects for many health issues.
Contact: www.EuroPharmaUSA.com 866-598-5487
